author: Nick Nairn
method: Mix all the ingredients together in a large bowl and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 tomato, roughly chopped,  2 spring onions, finely chopped,  ½ cucumber, roughly chopped,  small handful fresh basil, torn,  small handful fresh flatleaf parsley, torn,  2-3 tbsp olive oil,  ½ lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
